title: Bug 138175: Bookmark link set in drill through link should be saved in Hyperlink Options dialog.
OB: When reopening the Hyperlink Options dialog, the selected bookmark is missing.
EB: The selected bookmark should be displayed in the Hyperlink Options dialog. It should not be lost when reopening the dialog.
SR:
1. Define a drill through link with a target bookmark selected.
2. Reopen the Hyperlink Options dialog.
